document.snippet: thus, according to the present invention, the rate of defective liquid lenses can be minimized.

document.title: lentille de fresnel et del l'utilisant
document.snippet: accordingly, it is apparent that the illuminating device shown in fig. 17 is better than that shown in fig. 9, in terms of the light output values and the brightness uniformity.
